------------------------------------------------------------------------


Sarah Montgomery (Sarah Lind) is rescued by Kane (Steven Seagal), Johnny Garcia (Jessie Hutch) and Mark Simms (LochlynMunro), who end up caught in an ambush by bandits. Abdul Hassan (Amir Arison), an Egyptian terrorist, hiding a mysterious artifact after finding Milan Saric (Mike Dopud) in a brothel. Kane decides to trace the steps of Salim Abboud and sends his team on this mission. They discover that Abboud is willing to pay 650 million dollars for the content of such mysterious artifact which, Kane suspects may be a nuclear weapon. Then begins a relentless search to find out where and what Hassan is hiding, and prevent the object being sold on the black market.
